title: Will Legalizing Marijuana Exacerbate the United States’ Opioid Epidemic?
subtitle: White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer suggested that the Trump administration will likely enforce federal marijuana prohibition, citing America’s opioid crisis as a reason to do so — a claim that is inconsistent with available scientific data.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Policies that legalize recreational marijuana exacerbate America’s opioid addiction epidemic.
